summary.p: This critical edition of the Mahābhārata Āraṅyakaparvan (Part 1) was digitized by the Digital Library of India in 2015. According to the file metadata, it was scanned from a physical copy at the L.B.S. National Academy of Administration.

lg.l: ūruṃūrūkuru rājñaḥ samāsādyasamāviśya kapotaḥ śyenajād bhayāt |
śaraṇārthī tadātatotathā rājan nililye bhayapīḍitaḥ || 20
dharmātmānaṃ tv ahur ekaṃsvāmihaikaṃsvāmiha vaicāhurekaṃprāhurekaṃ sarve rājan mahīkṣitaḥrājanprāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ |
sa vaisarva dharmaviruddhaṃ tvaṃ kasmāt karma cikīrṣasi || 1
vihitaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ rājanvidhinā vihitaṃ bhakṣyaṃ pīḍyamānasya me kṣudhā |
mā bhāṅkṣīrmā rakṣemā rakṣīrmāṃ rakṣamā hiṃsīr dharmalobhenadharmalopena dharmam utsṛṣṭavān asi || 2
saṃtrastarūpas trāṇārthī tvatto bhīto mahādvija |
matsakāśam anuprātaṃ prāṇagṛdhnur ayaṃ dvijaḥ || 3
evam abhyāgatasyeha kapotasyābhayārthinaḥ |
apradāne paro 'dharmaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ śyena prapaśyasi || 4
praspandamānaḥ saṃbhrāntaḥ kapotaḥ śyena lakṣyate |
matsakāśaṃ jīvitārthī tasya tyāgo vigārhitaḥ || 5
āhārāt sarvabhūtāni saṃbhavanti mahīpatemahītale |
āhāreṇa vi[e]va vardhante tena jīvantisaṃbhavaṃti ca jantavaḥsarvaśaḥ || 6
śakyate dustyaje 'py arthedustyajety artheduḥkṛte py arthepuṣkalasyārthe cirarātrāya jīvitum |
na tu bhojanam utsṛjya śakyaṃ vartayituṃvai jīvituṃ ciram || 7
bhakṣyādbhakṣād vilopitasyādyaviyojitasyādyavilobhitasyādya mama prāṇā viśāṃ pate |
visṛjya kāyam eṣyantiyāsyaṃti panthānam apunarbhavamakutobhayaṃ || 8
pramṛteprasṛtemanmatemanmṛtepramītemṛte tu mayi dharmātman putradāraṃputradārādi naśiṣyatimariṣyativinaṃkṣyatibhaviṣyatinaṃkṣyati |
rakṣamānaḥrājan rakṣan kapotaṃ tvaṃ bahūn prāṇān naśiṣyasina rakṣasi || 9
dharmaṃbahūn yo bādhate dharmo na sa dharmaḥ kudharma tatkuvartma tatkudharmavitkudharmavatkathaṃcana |
avirodhīavirodhātavirodhe tuhi[']pica yo dharmaḥ sa dharmaḥ satyavikramasadbhir ucyate || 10
virodhiṣuvirodheṣu mahīpāla niścitya gurulāghavamnityaṃ jaṃtuṣu sarvaśaḥ |
na bādhā vidyate yatra taṃ dharmaṃdharmaṃ taṃ samudācaretsamupācaretsamupācarasamudācarasamudāhṛtaṃvibudhā viduḥ || 11
gurulāghavam ājñāyaādāyaajñāyaāsthāya dharmādharmaviniścaye |
yato bhūyāṃs tato rājan kuru dharmaviniścayamkuruṣva dharmaniścayaṃ(unepic cadence!) || 12
bahukalyāṇasaṃyuktaṃ bhāṣase vihagottama |
suparṇaḥ pakṣirāṭ_ kiṃ tvaṃ dharmajñaś cāsy asaṃśayam |
tathā hi dharmasaṃyuktaṃ bahu citraṃ prabhāṣase || 13
na te 'sty aviditaṃ kiṃcid iti tvā lakṣayāmy aham |
śaraṇaiṣiṇaḥ parityāgaṃ kathaṃ sādhv iti manyase || 14
āhārārthaṃāhārārthe samārambhas tava cāyaṃ vihaṃgama |
śakyaś cāpy anyathā[a]dhikaṃ[a]dhikaḥ kartumkarma āhāro 'py adhikas tvayāāhāro [']bhyadhikas tvayāāhāro [']ty adhikas tvayāāhāraḥ pakṣiṇāṃ vara || 15 ||
govṛṣo vā varāho vā mṛgo vā mahiṣo 'pi vā |
tvadartham adya kriyatāṃ yad vānyad abhikāṅkṣase || 16
na varāhaṃ na cokṣāṇaṃ na mṛgān vividhāṃs tathā |
bhakṣayāmi mahārāja kim annād yena tena me || 17
yas tu me daivavihitovihito bhakṣyodevavihito bhakṣaḥbhakṣyaḥvidhātrā kṣatriyapuṃgavakṣatriyarṣabha |
tam utsṛjautsṛjya mahīpālamahāraja kapotam imam eva menānyaṃ bhakṣyam ihāsti menānyaṃ bhakṣyam ahaṃ vṛṇe || 18
śyenāḥ kapotān khādantiśyenaḥ kapotān attīti sthitirśrutir eṣā sanātanīpurātanī |
mā rājan mārgamsāram ājñāyaajñātvāājñātvā kadalīskandhamkadalīstaṃbhamkadalīkaṃda āruhaārujaāvrajaāsajaāśrayabhakṣanaḥ || 19
rājyaṃrājyaṃ carāṣṭraṃ śibīnām ṛddhaṃ vaicahi śādhi pakṣigaṇārcitapakṣigaṇārcitaḥpakṣigaṇānvitaḥ |
yad vā kāmayase kiṃcic chyena sarvaṃ dadāni te |
vinemaṃ pakṣiṇaṃ śyena śaraṇārthinam āgatam || 20
yenemaṃ varjayethās tvaṃ karmaṇā pakṣisattama |
tadācakṣva kariṣyāmi na hi dāsye kapotakam || 21
uśīnara kapote te yadi sneho narādhipa |
ātmano māṃsam utkṛtya kapotatulayā dhṛtam || 22
yadā samaṃ kapotena tava māṃsaṃ bhaven nṛpa |
tadā pradeyaṃ tan mahyaṃ sā me tuṣṭir bhaviṣyati || 23
anugraham imaṃ manye śyena yan mābhianugrahaṃ śyena manye yan me māṃsaṃ hi yācasebhāṣase |
tasmāt tetad adya 'dyatesma[']haṃ pradāsyāmi svamāṃsaṃ tulayā dhṛtam || 24

app.lem: tataḥ kim upacāro 'sya pratyahe kriyate vṛthā |

lg.l: athotkṛtya svamāṃsaṃ tu rājā paramadharmavit |
tulayāmāsa kaunteya kapotena sahābhibho || 25
dhriyamāṇas tu tulayākapotas tu kapotomāṃsenā vyatiricyatevyatiricyatatyatiricyate |
punabhūyaś cotkṛtya māṃsāni rājā prādād uśīnaraḥ || 26
na vidyate yadā māṃsaṃ kapotena samaṃ dhṛtam |
tata utkṛttamāṃsotata utkṛtyamāṃsaṃtata utkṛttamāṃsaṃ 'sāvsasvaṃ āruroha svayaṃ tulāmāruroha tadā rājanāruroha tulāṃ svayaṃsvayameva tulāṃ nṛpa || 27
indro 'ham asmi dharmajñarajeṃdrabhadraṃ te kapoto havyavāḍ ayamhavyavāhanaḥ |
jijñāsamānau dharme tvāṃdharmeṇadharmaṃ tvāṃ yajñavāṭam upāgatauyajñe te samupāgatau || 28
yat te māṃsāni gātrebhya uktṛttāni viśāṃ patesamutkṛttāni pārthiva |
eṣā te bhāsvarībhāsvarābhāsvatīśāśvatī kīrtir lokān abhibhaviṣyatilokān aticariṣyatilokān abhigamiṣyatilokān adhigamiṣyatiloke sthāsyati śāśvatī || 29
yāval loke manuṣyās tvāṃ kathayiṣyanti pārthiva |
tāvat kīrtiś ca lokāś ca sthāsyanti tava śāsvatāḥ || 30
